titles.title: Elk Valley Land Restoration Act
To restore the reservation lands of the Elk Valley Band of Indians of the Elk Valley Rancheria of California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: 4/13/2000--Introduced. Elk Valley Land Restoration Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to take into trust for the benefit of the Elk Valley Band of Indians of the Elk Valley Rancheria of California any real property located in Del Norte County, California, if: (1) such property is conveyed or otherwise transferred to the Secretary by or for the Tribe's benefit; and (2) at the time of such conveyance or transfer, there are no adverse legal claims to such property, including outstanding liens, mortgages, or taxes owed. Provides that any such property taken into trust shall be considered part of the Tribe's initial reservation.
